sentences.english: Some people even put up stocking for their pets as well.
sentences.chinese: 一些人甚至为他们的宠物也准备长统袜。

sentences.english: On Christmas Eve I hung up my stocking along with my sisters'.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节前夕，我把我的长统袜跟姐妹们的挂在一起。

sentences.english: They want Santa Claus to put presents in their stockings.
sentences.chinese: 他们想让圣诞老人在他们的长统袜里放礼物。

sentences.english: She tore her stockings this morning.
sentences.chinese: 她今天早上刮破了长统袜。

sentences.english: He also noticed the daughters stockings.
sentences.chinese: 他也注意到了女孩们的长统袜。

sentences.english: Let me look at these stockings, please.
sentences.chinese: 请让我看看这些长统袜。

sentences.english: She wore no hose, even though the spring air still had a bite to it.
sentences.chinese: 她没有穿长统袜，尽管春天的空气仍然有点冷。

sentences.english: The wife was stitching her stockings.
sentences.chinese: 妻子正在缝合她的长统袜。

sentences.english: The stockings were held up with suspenders.
sentences.chinese: 那长统袜是用吊带拉住的。

sentences.english: She found a hole in it when she pulled on her stockings.
sentences.chinese: 她穿长统袜的时候发现上面有一个洞。

sentences.english: Mr and Mrs Green have stockings, too.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生和格林夫人也准备了长统袜。

sentences.english: Children often hang up stockings to fill with small gifts.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们常常挂起长统袜用来盛装小礼物。

sentences.english: It is annoying when stockings ladder.
sentences.chinese: 长统袜抽丝时真叫人扫兴。

sentences.english: Children put stockings at the end of their beds before they go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 在孩子们睡觉之前，他们在床头挂上一只长统袜。

sentences.english: I found a lot of goodies in the stockings .
sentences.chinese: 我发现许多糖果在我的长统袜里。

sentences.english: I found a lot of goodies in my stockings.
sentences.chinese: 我发现许多糖果在我的长统袜里。

definition: variant of 長筒靴|长筒靴[chang2 tong3 xue1]
